summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to Apex Belltown Co-op by Ordinance 110663 to construct and maintain a shear wall on the east side of the 1st-Western Avenues Alley, to the rear of 2225 1/2 1st Avenue by amending Section 8 thereof to update insurance requirements; and by establishing the annual fee for the next five (5) years of the permit.
